scripts.build:icons: npm install && npm run clean && npm run generate:icons && npm run ts-dts && npm run copy:icons
scripts.build:illustrations: npm install && npm run clean && npm run generate:illustrations && npm run ts-dts && npm run copy:illustrations
scripts.publish:icons: npm run build:icons && npm publish --access public ./public
scripts.publish:illustrations: npm run build:illustrations && npm publish --access public ./public
